Posts.Content: I had a cone august 25th and I'm still waiting for my period. It seems late, but, we'll see. I cant say much about the post pain from the cone during the period since I havent had mine yet. But, I do have sharp pains from that area sometimes...perhaps vascular changes due to a nearing cycle. As for the lumps, its always safe to check them out, but around your period they seem common and almost sometimes feel knotty or ropy.... I get them too. Good luck
Posts.Title: Please Help, I'm In Pain!!

Posts.Content: MY gyn always told me to do the exam after the period. That during the period breasts always feel engorged, knotty, etc..... Good luck, Im sure you will be fine!
Posts.Title: Found a lump and am scared

Posts.Content: Glad your fine!!! Sometimes breasts do that prior to a monthly cycle. Always check the breast after the cycle.. so they tell me.
Posts.Title: Nervous about mammogram and ultrasound

Posts.Content: I wish you peace of mind and not to worry. I know thats hard... Perhaps its cystitis or something....sometimes these medical people worry you more with the way the say things than with the real results.... Try not to worry, and I will say a prayer for you. Keep us informed.
Posts.Title: Nervous about mammogram and ultrasound
